title: Rip Curl Flash-Bomb Wetsuit - Zip Free
description:
The World's Fastest Drying Wetsuit is now in Zip Free!

The Flash-Bomb Zip Free is Rip Curl's new Ultimate cold water performance wetsuit.

As a result of increased stretch from Rip Curl's exclusive E4 neoprene, the design team have engineered a zip free wetsuit that is just as easy to get on and off as a chest zip suit.

In doing so Flash-Bomb Zip Free boosts the surfing performance benefits by reducing the weight of the wetsuit and increasing the range of stretch during paddle and surfing motions.

KEY PERFORMANCE BENEFITS
Lighter - removal of chest zip and construction requirements decreases the weight. More stretch - full stretch through the chest panel assists in paddling and surfing movements.
Less water - No water leakage through chest zip
Designed for easy on and off - Specifically engineered for function and ease of use.

After the success of the Flash-Bomb in 2012 and improvements with E4 neoprene in 2013, Rip Curl is excited to take the World's number 1 voted wetsuit to the next performance level.

Track: Fuzz
Music: Tribe Of Noise
Source: Getty Images
